Articles.Content:
Am I the only one who really wants to fly the Planet Express Ship in Kerbal Space Program? I request a Kerbalized (Stockalike styled\*) Planet Express Ship be made with support for RoverDude's alcubiere drive and also as a functioning thruster engine.

![The_Planet_Express_Ship_by_gasclown.jpg](http://fc62.deviantart.com/fs11/i/2006/236/d/e/The_Planet_Express_Ship_by_gasclown.jpg)

![ship-large.png](http://spot.pcc.edu/~gkerr/paststudents/matt_shettles/mysite/images/ship-large.png)

[http://theinfosphere.org/Planet_Express_ship](http://theinfosphere.org/Planet_Express_ship)

![Planet_Express_Ship.jpg](http://theinfosphere.org/images/f/f1/Planet_Express_Ship.jpg)

\*Like C7 Aerospace Parts, except with "Electric Mucus" and red colors.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-21T22:15:31Z" title="03/21/2015 10:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 21, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

No, you're not the only one. I don't know if anyone will see this because this thread is over 5 years old, but I really want to fly and/or build a planet express ship in KSP. I could try to build one myself though, I'm pretty good at making replicas of stuff. I have <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr>, both DLCs, and tweakscale.
